items.sentence: These three beautiful girls are all my nieces.
I wonder why it took Tom that long to do that?
Tom can probably do that faster than Mary can.
My dog started barking when the doorbell rang.
I believe there is something suspicious afoot.
Tom dreamed that he would become an astronaut.
Tom stayed up very late studying for the exam.
The children were in their rooms sound asleep.
We don't have this kind of problem very often.
Tom requested that we stop what we were doing.
